channel.title: Main unbanned! yes
channel.description:
my main had gotten banned sometime last year. read this. im realy happy.
Dear .........
Thanks for the appeal,
Based on your history in RuneScape, and your apparently willingness to follow the rules, we have decided to give you a second chance. However this incident has been recorded on the account, you are being monitored, and any further rulebreaking will result in a permanent ban.
Your account has been banned for a period of one week, after which you will be able to play again. Do not send in further ban appeals, or messages about this.
We suggest that you take the time to make yourself familiar with our Rules of Conduct which can be found in the 'Information and Advice' section of www.runescape.com
Yours Sincerely Mod Simon C RuneScape Customer Support
**********************************
On 13th May 2006, you sent us the following:
To whom this may concern. Yes. I completely admit that i was wrong. I cheated and I'm sorry. I will never cheat on runescape again. I have played this on this character for about 4 years and I regret what I have done. Please consider my plea for mercy. Give me another chance, even if you give me black marks. Sincerely,(insert my name here)
*********************************
The contents of this message are strictly confidential and are intended only for the owner of the account to which it was sent. The contents of this message must not be disclosed to any other person or copies taken

item.title: Main unbanned! yes
item.dc:creator: @jorma69 jorma69
item.description:
@jorma69 wrote:

I have 4 main characters banned, 4 pures and 3 bankers banned
All those banned in old RS
Someone maby can remember names like oxygenol, stebenwulf, viilto 2, sarakanth(was good pure until get banned), haransisafile(yeah lol what a name…if ur from finland u will get it), liveforstr (hey not banned anymore!!! wtf just checked…bah no member time…no use).

Read full topic

item.title: Main unbanned! yes
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:2, topic:2774”]Nice one Mod Simon is a legend! He un-banned my level 90 main and kept my D Square and whip on it! Last time I got banned my accounts items were completely erased :S

I Love Mod Simon C. I admitted to cheating too and he un-banned me. All these other appeals saying blah, I didn’t auto, blah, wont get you unbanned.[/quote]

Not sense much you make, young padawan.

Read full topic

item.title: Main unbanned! yes
item.dc:creator: @purestevil2 purestevil2
item.description:
@purestevil2 wrote:

my main had gotten banned sometime last year. read this. im realy happy.

Dear …

Thanks for the appeal,

Based on your history in RuneScape, and your apparently willingness to follow the rules, we have decided to give you a second chance. However this incident has been recorded on the account, you are being monitored, and any further rulebreaking will result in a permanent ban.

Your account has been banned for a period of one week, after which you will be able to play again. Do not send in further ban appeals, or messages about this.

We suggest that you take the time to make yourself familiar with our Rules of Conduct which can be found in the ‘Information and Advice’ section of www.runescape.com

Yours Sincerely
Mod Simon C
RuneScape Customer Support

On 13th May 2006, you sent us the following:

To whom this may concern.
Yes. I completely admit that i was wrong. I cheated and I’m sorry. I will never cheat on runescape again. I have played this on this character for about 4 years and I regret what I have done. Please consider my plea for mercy. Give me another chance, even if you give me black marks.
Sincerely,(insert my name here)
